channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.9beta2
item.description:
PostgreSQL beta versions usually introduce incompatible on-disk data formats.

Do not install this update if you need to access databases created with PostgreSQL 18beta1.

If you want to keep your 18beta1 servers, be sure to dump your databases before installing this upgrade. Servers created with 18beta2 and 18beta3 are compatible with 18rc1.

  • PostgreSQL 18rc1 with PostGIS 3.6.0

You can find more info on the Github Releases Page.
